document.discussion_title: Kiwi falls ahead of Wheeler speech
document.topic_text: The New Zealand dollar fell as Federal Reserve officials talked up the prospect of an interest rate hike this year which would sap the kiwi's relative interest rate advantage, and ahead of a speech by Reserve Bank governor Graeme... »
